languages.text: "Омниссия даровал нам высшую миссию — Поиск знания. Факт ее существования подтверждает, что не вся вселенная постигнута и квантифицирована разумом. Значит, никакой запрет не может считаться универсально актуальным. Все ограничения нуждаются в исключениях, но исключения отрицают нерушимость запретов".

"The Omnissiah has bestowed upon us the supreme mission, the Quest for Knowledge. The fact of its existence confirms that reason is yet to comprehend and quantify the universe in its entirety. This precludes the existence of any prohibition that could be considered universally relevant. All limitations need their exceptions, yet exceptions belie the inviolability of prohibitions."
languages.original_text: "Омниссия даровал нам высшую миссию — Поиск знания. Факт ее существования подтверждает, что не вся вселенная постигнута и квантифицирована разумом. Значит, никакой запрет не может считаться универсально актуальным. Все ограничения нуждаются в исключениях, но исключения отрицают нерушимость запретов".

traits.locale_text: "The Omnissiah has bestowed upon us the supreme mission, the Search for Knowledge. The fact of its existence confirms that reason is yet to comprehend and quantify the universe in its entirety. This precludes the existence of any prohibition that could be considered universally relevant. All limitations need their exceptions; yet exceptions belie the inviolability of prohibitions."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “欧姆尼塞亚赋予了我们至高的使命，那就是求知远征。求知远征存在的本身，说明我们的理性还没能理解、量化宇宙的全部知识。因此，也就没有任何禁令可以在无限范围内普遍适用。所有限制都必须有例外情况，然而这些例外情况的存在，却让人误以为这些禁令是可以违背的。”
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah has bestowed upon us the supreme mission, the Quest for Knowledge. The fact of its existence confirms that reason is yet to comprehend and quantify the universe in its entirety. This precludes the existence of any prohibition that could be considered universally relevant. All limitations need their exceptions, yet exceptions belie the inviolability of prohibitions."

traits.locale_text: “欧姆尼塞亚赋予了我们至高的使命，那就是求知远征。求知远征存在的本身，说明我们的理性还没能理解、量化宇宙的全部知识。因此，也就没有任何禁令可以在无限范围内普遍适用。所有限制都必须有例外情况，然而这些例外情况的存在，却让人误以为这些禁令是可以违背的。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «El Omnissiah nos ha concedido la misión suprema, la búsqueda del conocimiento. Su mera existencia confirma que la razón aún no ha terminado de comprender y cuantificar la totalidad del universo. Eso significa que no hay ninguna prohibición que pueda tener una relevancia universal. Para cada prohibición hay excepciones, aunque esas mismas excepciones ponen en entredicho la inviolabilidad de las prohibiciones».
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah has bestowed upon us the supreme mission, the Quest for Knowledge. The fact of its existence confirms that reason is yet to comprehend and quantify the universe in its entirety. This precludes the existence of any prohibition that could be considered universally relevant. All limitations need their exceptions, yet exceptions belie the inviolability of prohibitions."

traits.locale_text: «El Omnissiah nos ha concedido la misión suprema, la búsqueda del conocimiento. Su mera existencia confirma que la razón aún no ha terminado de comprender y cuantificar la totalidad del universo. Eso significa que no hay ninguna prohibición que pueda tener una relevancia universal. Para cada prohibición hay excepciones, aunque esas mismas excepciones ponen en entredicho la inviolabilidad de las prohibiciones».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「万機神は、私たちに知識探求という至高の使命を授けられた。その存在という事実は、理性がまだ宇宙全体を理解し、定量化していないことを裏付けている。このことは、普遍的な関連性があると考えられる禁止事項の存在を排除している。すべての制限には例外が必要だが、例外は禁止の不可侵性を裏切るものだ」
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah has bestowed upon us the supreme mission, the Quest for Knowledge. The fact of its existence confirms that reason is yet to comprehend and quantify the universe in its entirety. This precludes the existence of any prohibition that could be considered universally relevant. All limitations need their exceptions, yet exceptions belie the inviolability of prohibitions."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神は、私たちに知識探求という至高の使命を授けられた。その存在という事実は、理性がまだ宇宙全体を理解し、定量化していないことを裏付けている。このことは、普遍的な関連性があると考えられる禁止事項の存在を排除している。すべての制限には例外が必要だが、例外は禁止の不可侵性を裏切るものだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Omnissiah hat uns die heiligste aller Aufgaben übertragen, die Suche nach Wissen. Deren Existenz ist der Beleg, dass unser Verstand das Universum noch nicht in seiner Gesamtheit verstanden und quantifiziert hat. Das schließt die Existenz eines Verbots aus, das als universell relevant angesehen werden könnte. Alle Beschränkungen benötigen Ausnahmen, doch Ausnahmen täuschen über die Unverletzlichkeit von Verboten hinweg."
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah has bestowed upon us the supreme mission, the Quest for Knowledge. The fact of its existence confirms that reason is yet to comprehend and quantify the universe in its entirety. This precludes the existence of any prohibition that could be considered universally relevant. All limitations need their exceptions, yet exceptions belie the inviolability of prohibitions."

traits.locale_text: "Die Omnissiah hat uns die heiligste aller Aufgaben übertragen, die Suche nach Wissen. Deren Existenz ist der Beleg, dass unser Verstand das Universum noch nicht in seiner Gesamtheit verstanden und quantifiziert hat. Das schließt die Existenz eines Verbots aus, das als universell relevant angesehen werden könnte. Alle Beschränkungen benötigen Ausnahmen, doch Ausnahmen täuschen über die Unverletzlichkeit von Verboten hinweg."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « L'Omnimessie nous a confié la plus suprême des missions : la Quête de la Connaissance. Sa simple existence confirme bien que la raison n'est pas encore en mesure de comprendre et de quantifier l'univers dans sa globalité. Ceci exclut la présence de toute interdiction pouvant être considérée comme universellement pertinente. Toute limite a besoin d'une exception, mais les exceptions démentent l'inviolabilité des interdictions. »
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah has bestowed upon us the supreme mission, the Quest for Knowledge. The fact of its existence confirms that reason is yet to comprehend and quantify the universe in its entirety. This precludes the existence of any prohibition that could be considered universally relevant. All limitations need their exceptions, yet exceptions belie the inviolability of prohibitions."

languages.text: "Hermesih bize yüce bir misyon bahşetti: İrfan Arayışı. Onun mevcudiyeti, evrenin akıllarımızca bütün olarak henüz idrak edilmediğinin ve hesaplanamadığının ispatıdır. Bu da bütün yasakların evrensel geçerliliği olduğu düşüncesini geçersiz kılar. Tüm sınırlamaların istisnası olması gerekir. Öte yandan istisnalar, yasakların ihlal edilemezliğiyle çelişir."
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah has bestowed upon us the supreme mission, the Quest for Knowledge. The fact of its existence confirms that reason is yet to comprehend and quantify the universe in its entirety. This precludes the existence of any prohibition that could be considered universally relevant. All limitations need their exceptions, yet exceptions belie the inviolability of prohibitions."

traits.locale_text: "Hermesih bize yüce bir misyon bahşetti: İrfan Arayışı. Onun mevcudiyeti, evrenin akıllarımızca bütün olarak henüz idrak edilmediğinin ve hesaplanamadığının ispatıdır. Bu da, bütün yasakların evrensel olarak geçerli olduğu düşüncesini geçersiz kılar. Tüm sınırlamaların istisnası olması gerekir. Öte yandan istisnalar, yasakların ihlal edilemezliğiyle çelişir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
